mapper.select: SELECT post.post_id, COALESCE(post.post_title_mmr, post.post_title_eng) AS post_title, post.post_title_img_url, post.post_title_eng, post.created_date, admin.admin_name, post.content_type FROM post JOIN administrator AS admin ON (post.admin_id = admin.admin_id) WHERE post.category_id = (SELECT category_id FROM category WHERE lower(category_name) = lower(#{categoryName}) ) ORDER BY post.post_id desc

SELECT post.post_id, COALESCE(post.post_title_mmr, post.post_title_eng) AS post_title, post.post_title_img_url, post.post_title_eng, post.created_date, admin.admin_name FROM post JOIN administrator AS admin ON (post.admin_id = admin.admin_id) WHERE post.content_type = 0 AND lower(post.post_title_eng) LIKE lower(#{pattern}) ORDER BY post.post_id desc LIMIT 7
